info.title: AltrumAI API
info.description: # Introduction Welcome to the ***AltrumAI API*** – an enterprise-grade unified proxy designed to provide secure, policy-based access to leading Large Language Model (LLM) APIs and AI platforms. The AltrumAI API acts as a centralised gateway to services including ***OpenAI, Anthropic, Azure AI Studio, Amazon Bedrock,*** and ***Google Gemini***. By leveraging advanced guardrails and enforcement mechanisms, it ensures that your organisation can safely and responsibly integrate AI capabilities while adhering to internal policies, data privacy regulations, and ethical standards. Built for scale and flexibility, AltrumAI empowers enterprises to: • ***Control access*** to AI services through dynamic, project-level policies in your organisation. • ***Enforce compliance*** with data handling, audit, and usage guidelines. • ***Abstract complexity*** by managing multiple AI providers through a single API interface. To begin using the AltrumAI API, you’ll need a Project API Key, which must be included in the request headers. You can obtain this key by registering your AI project on the AltrumAI Platform. This documentation will guide you through setup, usage, and advanced features of AltrumAI API, ensuring you can use AI responsibly across your organisation at scale.

post.description: Proxy endpoint for OpenAI Chat Completions API

parameters.name: authorization

schema.description: OpenAI API key in format 'Bearer sk-...'
schema.title: Authorization

parameters.description: OpenAI API key in format 'Bearer sk-...'

x-codeSamples.label: Shell

x-codeSamples.source:
import openai
openai.api_key = 'OPENAI_API_KEY'
openai.base_url = 'https://api.altrum.ai/v1/openai/'
response = openai.chat.completions.create(
        model='gpt-4o-mini',
        messages=[
            {'role': 'assistant', 'content': 'You are a helpful assistant.'},
            {'role': 'user', 'content': 'Hello!'}
        ],
        stream=False,
        extra_headers={'Project-Api-Key': 'ALTRUMAI_PROJECT_API_KEY'},
    )
print(response.choices[0].message.content)
x-codeSamples.label: Python
Javascript

post.description: Proxy endpoint for Anthropic Claude Chat Completions API

x-codeSamples.label: Shell

x-codeSamples.source:
from openai import OpenAI
client = OpenAI(
    api_key="anything",
    base_url="https://api.altrum.ai/v1/anthropic/")

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="claude-3-opus-20240229", 
    messages=[
                {"role":"system", "content": "You are a helpful assistant"},
                {"role": "user", "content": "Hello"},
            ],
    stream=False,
    extra_headers={"Project-Api-Key":"ALTRUMAI_PROJECT_API_KEY",
                    "Authorization":"ANTHROPIC_API_KEY"})
print(response.choices[0].message.content)
x-codeSamples.label: Python
Javascript

post.description: Proxy endpoint for Azure OpenAI Chat Completions API

parameters.name: deployment_id

schema.description: The deployment ID of the model
schema.title: Deployment Id

parameters.description: The deployment ID of the model

parameters.name: authorization

schema.description: Azure OpenAI API key in format 'Bearer {key}'
schema.title: Authorization

parameters.description: Azure OpenAI API key in format 'Bearer {key}'

x-codeSamples.label: Shell

x-codeSamples.source:
from openai import AzureOpenAI

client = AzureOpenAI(
    azure_endpoint="https://api.altrum.ai/v1/azure/{ENDPOINT}",
    azure_deployment=DEPLOYMENT_ID,
    api_key=AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY,
    api_version="2024-10-21",
    default_headers={"Project-Api-Key": "ALTRUMAI_PROJECT_API_KEY"}
)
response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model=DEPLOYMENT_ID,
    messages= [ 
        {"role": "assistant", "content": "You are a helpful assistant."},
        {"role": "user", "content": "Hello"},
    ],
    stream=False,
)
print(response.choices[0].message.content)
x-codeSamples.label: Python
Javascript

post.description: Proxy endpoint for Azure AI Studio Chat Completions API

parameters.name: authorization

schema.description: Azure AI Studio API key in format 'Bearer {key}'
schema.title: Authorization

parameters.description: Azure AI Studio API key in format 'Bearer {key}'

x-codeSamples.label: Shell

x-codeSamples.source:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI(
    base_url="https://api.altrum.ai/v1/azure-ai/{ENDPOINT}",
    api_key= AZURE_AI_STUDIO_API_KEY,
    default_headers={"Project-Api-Key": ALTRUMAI_PROJECT_API_KEY},
)
response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model= MODEL_NAME,
    messages= [ 
        {"role": "assistant", "content": "You are a helpful assistant."},
        {"role": "user", "content": "Hello"},
    ],
    stream=False,
)
print(response.choices[0].message.content)
x-codeSamples.label: Python
Javascript

post.description: Proxy endpoint for Amazon Bedrock Chat Completions API

x-codeSamples.label: Shell

x-codeSamples.source:
import openai
import boto3
import os

session = boto3.Session(aws_access_key_id = os.getenv("AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID"),
                        aws_secret_access_key = os.getenv("AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY"),
                        region_name= os.getenv("AWS_REGION"))

openai.api_key = "ANYTHING"
openai.base_url = "https://api.altrum.ai/v1/amazon-bedrock/"
aws_access_key_id = os.getenv("AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID")
aws_secret_access_key = os.getenv("AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY")
aws_region_name = os.getenv("AWS_REGION")

response = openai.chat.completions.create(
    model="amazon.titan-text-express-v1",
    messages=[
        {"role": "assistant", "content": "You are a helpful assistant."},
        {"role": "user", "content": "Hello"}
    ],
    stream=False,
    extra_headers = {"Project-Api-Key": "ALTRUMAI_PROJECT_API_KEY", 
                    "aws-access-key-id":aws_access_key_id, 
                    "aws-secret-access-key":aws_secret_access_key,
                    "aws-region-name":aws_region_name},
)
print(response.choices[0].message.content)
x-codeSamples.label: Python
Javascript

post.description: Proxy endpoint for Google Gemini Chat Completions API

x-codeSamples.label: Shell

x-codeSamples.source:
from openai import OpenAI
client = OpenAI(
    api_key="anything",
    base_url="https://api.altrum.ai/v1/gemini/")

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="gemini-1.5-pro", 
    messages=[
                {"role":"system", "content": "You are a helpful assistant"},
                {"role": "user", "content": "Hello"},
            ],
    stream=False,
    extra_headers={"Project-Api-Key":"ALTRUMAI_PROJECT_API_KEY",
                    "Authorization":"GEMINI_API_KEY"})
print(response.choices[0].message.content)
x-codeSamples.label: Python
Javascript

message.content:
The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)!

The GDPR is a European Union (EU) regulation that went into effect on May 25, 2018, aiming to strengthen and unify data protection for individuals within the EU. It applies to any organization that processes personal data of EU residents,

AzureAIRequest.title: AzureAIRequest
AzureAIRequest.description: Schema for Azure AI Studio API requests.

messages.content: Tell me about AI in 30 words

message.content:
The United Kingdom (UK) is a country located off the northwestern coast of mainland Europe. It is made up of four constituent countries: England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland. The capital city is London, which is not only the largest city in the UK but also a major global financial and cultural center.**History**: The UK has a rich history that includes the Roman occupation, the formation of the monarchy, the spread of the British Empire, and significant events like the Industrial Revolution and both World Wars.

2. **Culture**: The UK is renowned for its contributions to literature, music, and the arts. Famous writers such as William Shakespeare, Jane Austen, and Charles Dickens hail from the UK, while it has produced iconic musical acts like The Beatles and The Rolling Stones.

The capital city is London, which is not only the largest city in the UK but also a major global financial and cultural center.**History**: The UK has a rich history that includes the Roman occupation, the formation of the monarchy, the spread of the British Empire, and significant events like the Industrial Revolution and both World Wars.

2. **Culture**: The UK is renowned for its contributions to literature, music, and the arts. Famous writers such as William Shakespeare, Jane Austen, and Charles Dickens hail from the UK, while it has produced iconic musical acts like The Beatles and The Rolling Stones.
